text: Wojciech Pokora (2 October 1934 – 4 February 2018) was a Polish actor. He has made over 40 appearances in movie and television. He starred in the 1986-1987 television series Zmiennicy and Czterdziestolatek 1970–1974. He was born in Warsaw. He also appeared in Man – Woman Wanted and A Jungle Book of Regulations. Pokora died on 4 February 2018 in Warsaw of complications from a stroke at the age of 83.Wojciech Pokora nie żyje ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1934 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Polish movie actors Category:Polish television actors Category:Entertainers from Warsaw
title: Wojciech Pokora
